msbt.message: Here's that prezzie I couldn't give you the other day. Am I not, like, the amazingest for remembering? Given my cray-busy sched I'm pretty amazed by my own mad memory skills.
Here's that thank-you prezzie I couldn't give you the other day! Do you think notes like this might be collector's items someday? Or displayed at a pop star museum! Hi, future museum visitors!
Thanks for the other day. Here's that thank-you prezzie I couldn't give you! Enough about that! Isn't this letter totes legit très-mazing? I picked out the paper thinking of you!
